Title: Legacy
Description: I'd say we've earned our reward. I can't wait to taste what Mudmug's been brewing.
ObjectivesText: Have a drink with Chen, Li Li, and Mudmug.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Li Li at Mudmug's Place in the Valley of the Four Winds.
RewardText:
I know Uncle Chen's coming back. I'm not worried.

Actually, this is probably my big chance to finally explore Pandaria! No fat uncle tying me down!
